job_description: Proof of Concept to ProductionTo transform a data science prototype into production-ready code, you must refactor the code for scalability and maintainability, implement robust testing and version control, containerize the project, and establish a deployment and monitoring strategy. This involves organizing the code into modular, reusable functions, adding automated testing to catch bugs early, using version control for code and data, and setting up processes for monitoring performance and updating the model in production.
